name: Battle For Cosmos
description:
Battle For Cosmos is an exciting real-time strategy game that takes place in space. It stips away most of the boring aspects of other strategy games, so you can get down in to the action-packed battles quicker.

The game's campaign mode features over 80 challenging levels, each with layouts and increasingly difficult opponents. Along the way, players can learn to construct 7 different buildings to help in the quick battles.

For those who prefer a more open-ended experience, the game also includes a Sandbox generator, which allows players to create their own custom maps and scenarios to play against the AI.

Speaking of AI, Battle For Cosmos features 5 different computer-controlled opponents, each with their own unique strengths and weaknesses. Players must use their wits and strategic prowess to outmaneuver and defeat these foes, while simultaneously building up their own empire and controlling their money flow.

Overall, Battle For Cosmos is an engaging and challenging game that offers hours of strategic gameplay and endless replayability. Whether you're a seasoned RTS veteran or a newcomer to the genre, our action-packed space strategy game will keep you engaged for hours on end. Download now and conquer the cosmos!
